verses.verse: Moreover the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> came unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying,

And thou <S%H1121><s%>, son of man <S%H120><s%>, thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%> unto the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, An end <S%H7093><s%>: the end <S%H7093><s%> is come <S%H935><s%> upon the four <S%H702><s%> corners <S%H3671><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>.

Now is the end <S%H7093><s%> upon thee <S%H7971><s%>, and I will send mine anger <S%H639><s%> upon thee <S%H8199><s%>, and will judge thee according to thy ways <S%H1870><s%>; and I will bring <S%H5414><s%> upon thee all thine abominations <S%H8441><s%>.

And mine eye <S%H5869><s%> shall not spare <S%H2347><s%> thee <S%H2550><s%>, neither will I have pity; but I will bring <S%H5414><s%> thy ways <S%H1870><s%> upon thee <S%H8441><s%>, and thine abominations shall be in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of thee <S%H3045><s%>: and ye shall know that I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>: An evil <S%H7451><s%>, an only <S%H259><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%>; behold <S%H935><s%>, it cometh.
An end <S%H7093><s%> is come <S%H935><s%>, the end <S%H7093><s%> is come <S%H935><s%>; it awaketh <S%H6974><s%> against thee <S%H935><s%>; behold, it cometh.

Thy doom <S%H6843><s%> is come <S%H935><s%> unto thee <S%H3427><s%>, O inhabitant of the land <S%H776><s%>: the time <S%H6256><s%> is come <S%H935><s%>, the day <S%H3117><s%> is near <S%H7138><s%>, a day of tumult <S%H4103><s%>, and not of joyful shouting <S%H1906><s%>, upon the mountains <S%H2022><s%>.

Now will I shortly <S%H7138><s%> pour out <S%H8210><s%> my wrath <S%H2534><s%> upon thee <S%H3615><s%>, and accomplish mine anger <S%H639><s%> against thee <S%H8199><s%>, and will judge thee according to thy ways <S%H1870><s%>; and I will bring <S%H5414><s%> upon thee all thine abominations <S%H8441><s%>.

And mine eye <S%H5869><s%> shall not spare <S%H2347><s%>, neither will I have pity <S%H2550><s%>: I will bring <S%H5414><s%> upon thee according to thy ways <S%H1870><s%>; and thine abominations <S%H8441><s%> shall be in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of thee <S%H3045><s%>; and ye shall know that I <S%H3068><s%>, Jehovah, do smite <S%H5221><s%>.

Behold <S%H3117><s%>, the day, behold <S%H935><s%>, it cometh: thy doom <S%H6843><s%> is gone forth <S%H3318><s%>; the rod <S%H4294><s%> hath blossomed <S%H6692><s%>, pride <S%H2087><s%> hath budded <S%H6524><s%>.

Violence <S%H2555><s%> is risen up <S%H6965><s%> into a rod <S%H4294><s%> of wickedness <S%H7562><s%>; none of them shall remain <S%H1995><s%>, nor of their multitude, nor of their wealth <S%H1991><s%>: neither shall there be eminency among them <S%H5089><s%>.

The time <S%H6256><s%> is come <S%H935><s%>, the day <S%H3117><s%> draweth near <S%H5060><s%>: let not the buyer <S%H7069><s%> rejoice <S%H8055><s%>, nor the seller <S%H4376><s%> mourn <S%H56><s%>; for wrath <S%H2740><s%> is upon all the multitude thereof <S%H1995><s%>.

For the seller <S%H4376><s%> shall not return <S%H7725><s%> to that which is sold <S%H4465><s%>, although they be yet alive <S%H2416><s%>: for the vision <S%H2377><s%> is touching the whole multitude <S%H1995><s%> thereof <S%H7725><s%>, none shall return; neither shall any <S%H376><s%> strengthen <S%H2388><s%> himself in the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of his life <S%H2416><s%>.

They have blown <S%H8628><s%> the trumpet <S%H8619><s%>, and have made all ready <S%H3559><s%>; but none goeth <S%H1980><s%> to the battle <S%H4421><s%>; for my wrath <S%H2740><s%> is upon all the multitude thereof <S%H1995><s%>.

The sword <S%H2719><s%> is without <S%H2351><s%>, and the pestilence <S%H1698><s%> and the famine <S%H7458><s%> within <S%H1004><s%>: he that is in the field <S%H7704><s%> shall die <S%H4191><s%> with the sword <S%H2719><s%>: and he that is in the city <S%H5892><s%>, famine <S%H7458><s%> and pestilence <S%H1698><s%> shall devour him <S%H398><s%>.

But those of them that escape <S%H6403><s%> shall escape <S%H6412><s%>, and shall be on the mountains <S%H2022><s%> like doves <S%H3123><s%> of the valleys <S%H1516><s%>, all of them moaning <S%H1993><s%>, every one <S%H376><s%> in his iniquity <S%H5771><s%>.
All hands <S%H3027><s%> shall be feeble <S%H7503><s%>, and all knees <S%H1290><s%> shall be weak <S%H3212><s%> as water <S%H4325><s%>.

They shall also gird <S%H2296><s%> themselves with sackcloth <S%H8242><s%>, and horror <S%H6427><s%> shall cover <S%H3680><s%> them <S%H955><s%>; and shame shall be upon all faces <S%H6440><s%>, and baldness <S%H7144><s%> upon all their heads <S%H7218><s%>.

They shall cast <S%H7993><s%> their silver <S%H3701><s%> in the streets <S%H2351><s%>, and their gold <S%H2091><s%> shall be as an unclean <S%H5079><s%> thing <S%H3701><s%>; their silver and their gold <S%H2091><s%> shall not be able <S%H3201><s%> to deliver <S%H5337><s%> them in the day <S%H3117><s%> of the wrath <S%H5678><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: they shall not satisfy <S%H7646><s%> their souls <S%H5315><s%>, neither fill <S%H4390><s%> their bowels <S%H4578><s%>; because it hath been the stumblingblock <S%H4383><s%> of their iniquity <S%H5771><s%>.

As for the beauty <S%H6643><s%> of his ornament <S%H5716><s%>, he set <S%H7760><s%> it in majesty <S%H1347><s%>; but they made <S%H6213><s%> the images <S%H6754><s%> of their abominations <S%H8441><s%> and their detestable things <S%H8251><s%> therein <S%H5414><s%>: therefore have I made it unto them as an unclean thing <S%H5079><s%>.

And I will give <S%H5414><s%> it into the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the strangers <S%H2114><s%> for a prey <S%H957><s%>, and to the wicked <S%H7563><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> for a spoil <S%H7998><s%>; and they shall profane it <S%H2490><s%>.

My face <S%H6440><s%> will I turn <S%H5437><s%> also from them <S%H2490><s%>, and they shall profane my secret <S%H6845><s%> place <S%H6530><s%>; and robbers shall enter <S%H935><s%> into it <S%H2490><s%>, and profane it.

Make <S%H6213><s%> the chain <S%H7569><s%>; for the land <S%H776><s%> is full <S%H4390><s%> of bloody <S%H1818><s%> crimes <S%H4941><s%>, and the city <S%H5892><s%> is full <S%H4390><s%> of violence <S%H2555><s%>.

Wherefore I will bring <S%H935><s%> the worst <S%H7451><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%>, and they shall possess <S%H3423><s%> their houses <S%H1004><s%>: I will also make the pride <S%H1347><s%> of the strong <S%H5794><s%> to cease <S%H7673><s%>; and their holy places <S%H6942><s%> shall be profaned <S%H2490><s%>.
Destruction <S%H7089><s%> cometh <S%H935><s%>; and they shall seek <S%H1245><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%>, and there shall be none.

Mischief <S%H1943><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> upon mischief <S%H1943><s%>, and rumor <S%H8052><s%> shall be upon rumor <S%H8052><s%>; and they shall seek <S%H1245><s%> a vision <S%H2377><s%> of the prophet <S%H5030><s%>; but the law <S%H8451><s%> shall perish <S%H6><s%> from the priest <S%H3548><s%>, and counsel <S%H6098><s%> from the elders <S%H2205><s%>.

The king <S%H4428><s%> shall mourn <S%H56><s%>, and the prince <S%H5387><s%> shall be clothed <S%H3847><s%> with desolation <S%H8077><s%>, and the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> shall be troubled <S%H926><s%>: I will do <S%H6213><s%> unto them after their way <S%H1870><s%>, and according to their deserts <S%H4941><s%> will I judge <S%H8199><s%> them <S%H3045><s%>; and they shall know that I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
